Text: despo1ler i cant play episodes 20, 21 and 22 i can't also rename the file name. can you give me a suggestion to why this is happening?

ok i figured the problem out, it's a big file name and you cant play or rename the files, what you have to do is copy the directory to the root of the hd, usually c:\ and there you can change the filename to something shorter and the avi will play fine.
Thank you very much for your time and effort to share this with us.
